pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: YUME 3 is a maze break-through game. Players need to use the keyboard to control two characters to reach the designated position to enter the next level
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
